function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different occupancy patterns in households increase the risk of disease spread due to movement of people between locations","Impact":"Higher probability of disease transmission within and between households","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, promoting vaccination, and reducing unnecessary movement between households","Technologies":"Smart home technology for contactless control, air purifiers, and UV disinfection systems","People":"Household members, maids, and elderly individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, household members, and government"}]}
